overview: Brandon has been estranged from his parents ever since his dad took the fall for his bad business deal. Now, Brandon's married to a gorgeous, sweet blonde, Halsey, who convinces him he's got nothing to lose by asking his dad to invest in his new business. But dad isn't so eager to help the son a second time, which pushes his wife and mother of Brandon to give him an ultimatum. If he won't help the son, she'll hold back pussy privileges. . . for good this time! But the son's wife has a plan of her own to get dad to invest, by dangling her succulent, young honey pot in front of his depraved eyes. Love, lust, cheating and betrayal. . . all the fine qualities of a modern family.
title: Forbidden Affairs 7: My Son's Wife
